name: ShadowScape (Nohac)
description:
Goal: Avoid the shadows and survive as long as you can.

How to play:
- W, A, S, D to move the camera
- Left click and drag mouse to select units
- Right click to move selected units
- Left click resources to mine and build

Jam page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/$287116
